attributes.action: Give football a home in Barnet
attributes.additional_details: Neither Barnet or Hendon Football Club play in the London Borough of Barnet. The London Borough of Barnet has shown their utter disregard and contempt for football fans.  We demand that the Government make the London Borough of Barnet find a home for football within the Borough as stated in the London Borough of Barnet’s statutory unitary plan Policy GL1

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Council.
